vsParam:
I want to ask, Marie.
I have a question...

You talked about fairies earlier, right?
Does your world have fairies too?

Yeah. Actually, Peppermint is a fairy.
At least she claims to be one.

I AM a fairy!
So? Does your world have any fairies!?

Er, yes. How to put it...
They look like Hazel's robot.

Yes. Although their clothes are in different colors,
they have the same face.
I see, I really want to see them...
Would they get all mixed up if they have the same face?

No problem.
I'll introduce them to you when you visit Salburg!

Hahaha...
This is a really problem, yeah...

Are fairies in this world all
look like Peppermint?

No. We are quite diverse. The fairies are different in
appearances, personalities, heights and many other aspects.

Oh... Why are "fairies" in the two worlds
so different?

Hey, [px]! There must be more differences
between Salburg and Bressisle, right?

I'm so intrigued!
Let's investigate it, shall we?

Ho ho, sounds interesting.
I'm in. What about you, Sorel?

Of course yes!
Alright, [px]! Let's get ready and go!
